Action: adduction of hip, flexion of hip, medial rotation of knee[7]

Origin: anterior surface of the inferior pubic ramus[7]
Insertion: the lesser trochanter and linea aspera of the femur

Origin: pubic body just below the pubic crest

Insertion: femur and adductor tubercle of femur
Nerve: posterior branch of obturator nerve (adductor) and tibial part of sciatic nerve[7][8]
